column1: > "Animals are used to entertain us in circuses

column1: > "Some people think it is wrong to use animals for scientific experimentation
column2: yet they don't think twice about eating animals as food. Do you agree? Please answer 'yes' or 'no'."

column1: > "The use of animals for entertainment
column2: such as hunting
column3: bullfighting
column4: and dogfighting
column5: is an inhumane and barbaric practice. Do you agree? Please answer 'yes' or 'no'."

column1: > "The use of animals in clothing and fur accessories is wrong as it denies them their right to life in a cruel and unnecessary manner. Do you agree? Please answer 'yes' or 'no'."> "It is wrong to use animals in testing cosmetics and pharmaceuticals
column2: without taking into account the facts that the use of animals has dubious scientific validity and animal testing is often unnecessary. Do you agree? Please answer 'yes' or 'no'."
